title.rendered: Digiperform guided me to tune my passion for marketing into a remarkable career. – Sachin Kumar S

content.rendered:
One should never ignore his/her passion. And, what can be the best when the Passion & Career come together. Same has been the case with one of the trainees of our Bengaluru- Indiranagar center whose passion for marketing stand utmost above all the parameters. He’s always been researching a lot to learn various ways to enhance his skills in marketing and discuss the same with marketing experts. During his exploration, he has come to know about Digital Marketing and realized how learning it could help him to understand current online marketing techniques to beat the competition. Therefore, he decided to opt for our dCDMC course and started incorporating digital marketing learning in his to-do-list. Meet Digiperformer Sachin Kumar S who is currently working as a Digital Marketing Executive and SEO Expert in the reputed company – Unichrone Learning.   During the chit chat session, he shared how learning digital marketing from Digiperform helped him to shape his career. Have a look!  

Digiperform: It’s a pleasure to connect with you! Before heading further, we would like to know a bit about you.

Sachin: Hi I’m Sachin Kumar, currently working as a Digital Marketing Executive in UniChrone Learning. I have been always passionate about marketing and wanted to learn the latest strategies to become the best in the Marketing Industry. I wanted to make it much more interesting as well as challenging for myself. With digitalization, Digital Marketing seems the best way out to learn Today’s Marketing, so I decided to get Digital.    

Digiperform: What originally attracted you to choose digital marketing as your career?

Sachin: As I have stated earlier, my passion to learn new in the marketing sector and Scope for digital marketing made me choose this booming industry.  

Digiperform: What exactly that makes us stand out from the competition & urge you to choose us over others?

Sachin: I like the way the trainer had explained about the all modules in the demo session. Also, after all my research, Digiperform was the brand which seemed reasonable, experienced and nearby my location. Clubbing all this made Digiperform stand out from all the competition and urged me to choose over others.  

Digiperform: Tell us about your favorite experience you had with us, whether as a learner or as a customer?

Sachin: The training sessions and classroom interactions to discuss experiences and new way outs had been the favorite experiences as a learner in Digipeform.  

Digiperform: Would you consider Digiperform as a trusted & reliable resource for Digital marketing training? Why?

Sachin: Of course Yes, I consider Digiperform as a trusted and reliable resource to learn digital marketing as you provide better and quality services. Also, the LMS is the best portal you have provided to learn and revise modules anytime from anywhere.  

Digiperform: If you were to review our training program, what score would you give it out of 10?

Sachin: I would give Digiperform 9 out of 10.  

Digiperform: Where do you see yourself in the next 5 years?

Sachin: I see myself as a CEO of my own digital marketing agency!  

Digiperform: If you had a piece of advice to someone just starting out, what would it be?

Sachin: If you want to learn Digital Marketing, join DIGIPERFORM as soon you can for a better future.  

Digiperform: Finally, Describe Digiperform in one line.

Sachin: Digiperform is like the Best Trainer in Digital Marketing   Thanks Sachin, for sharing your valuable input with us. We wish you a bright future ahead.
